verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that the <S%H8248>butler<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and his <S%H644>baker<s%> had <S%H2398>offended<s%> their <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5631>officers<s%>, against the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H8248>butlers<s%>, and against the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H644>bakers<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H4929>ward<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>, into the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5470><s%>, the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H631>bound<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H6485>charged<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with them, and he <S%H8334>served<s%> them: and they continued a <S%H3117>season<s%> in <S%H4929>ward<s%>.

And they <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> both of <S%H8147>them<s%>, each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%>, each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream<s%>, the <S%H8248>butler<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which were <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5470><s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto them in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon them, and, behold, they were <S%H2196>sad<s%>.

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5631>officers<s%> that were with him in the <S%H4929>ward<s%> of his <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore <S%H6440>look<s%> ye so <S%H7451>sadly<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>? look: Heb. are your faces evil?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and there is no <S%H6622>interpreter<s%> of it. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Do not <S%H6623>interpretations<s%> belong to <S%H430>God<s%>? tell <S%H5608>me<s%> them, I pray you.

And the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, In my <S%H2472>dream<s%>, behold, a <S%H1612>vine<s%> was before <S%H6440>me<s%>;

And in the <S%H1612>vine<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%>: and it was as though it <S%H6524>budded<s%>, and her <S%H5322>blossoms<s%> shot <S%H5927>forth<s%>; and the <S%H811>clusters<s%> thereof brought forth <S%H1310>ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>:

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> was in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and <S%H7818>pressed<s%> them into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%>, and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, This is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of it: The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

<S%H5750>Yet<s%> within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> thee unto thy <S%H3653>place<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> when thou wast his <S%H8248>butler<s%>. lift: or, reckon

But <S%H2142>think<s%> on me when it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and <S%H6213>shew<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%>, I pray thee, unto me, and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of me unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>me<s%> out of this <S%H1004>house<s%>: think: Heb. remember me with thee

For indeed I was stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>: and here also have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> that they should <S%H7760>put<s%> me into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>.

When the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6622>interpretation<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, I <S%H637>also<s%> was in my <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and, behold, I had <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2751>white<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> on my <S%H7218>head<s%>: white: or, full of holes

And in the <S%H5945>uppermost<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%> there was of all <S%H3978>manner<s%> of <S%H4639>bakemeats<s%> <S%H644><s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>. bakemeats: Heb. meat of Pharaoh, the work of a baker, or, cook

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> thereof: The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

Yet within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H7218>head<s%> from off thee, and shall <S%H8518>hang<s%> thee on a <S%H6086>tree<s%>; and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from off thee. lift: or, reckon thee, and take thy office from thee

And it came to pass the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, which was <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3117>birthday<s%> <S%H3205><s%>, that he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> unto all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>: and he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> and of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>. lifted: or, reckoned

And he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> unto his <S%H4945>butlership<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%>:
But he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%>: as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to them.
Yet did not the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, but <S%H7911>forgat<s%> him.
